body: I honestly thought from the cover art that it was Izuku selfcest with a genderbent evil Izuku.
I would say this looks bad like the other comments but if you look at bakugo with tits next to his mom character design  it's pretty much same thing...

...... This is disturbing.. it's still Bakugou just with Tits and a Vagina, there is not even a single smidgen of feminity on Bakugou's face, I would get if they just made this a Deku and Mitsuki Bakugou doujin.
